26 #ifndef REACTPHYSICS3D_OVERLAPPING_PAIR_CONTACT_H
27 #define REACTPHYSICS3D_OVERLAPPING_PAIR_CONTACT_H
28 
29 // Libraries
30 #include <reactphysics3d/mathematics/mathematics.h>
31 #include <reactphysics3d/configuration.h>
32 #include <reactphysics3d/engine/OverlappingPairs.h>
33 
35 namespace reactphysics3d {
36 
37 // Structure ContactPair
41 struct ContactPair {
42 
43  public:
44 
45  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
46 
48  uint64 pairId;
49 
51  uint8 nbPotentialContactManifolds;
52 
54  uint32 potentialContactManifoldsIndices[NB_MAX_POTENTIAL_CONTACT_MANIFOLDS];
55 
57  Entity body1Entity;
58 
60  Entity body2Entity;
61 
63  Entity collider1Entity;
64 
66  Entity collider2Entity;
67 
69  bool isAlreadyInIsland;
70 
72  uint32 contactPairIndex;
73 
75  uint32 contactManifoldsIndex;
76 
78  uint32 nbContactManifolds;
79 
81  uint32 contactPointsIndex;
82 
84  uint32 nbToTalContactPoints;
85 
87  bool collidingInPreviousFrame;
88 
90  bool isTrigger;
91 
92  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
93 
95  ContactPair(uint64 pairId, Entity body1Entity, Entity body2Entity, Entity collider1Entity,
96  Entity collider2Entity, uint32 contactPairIndex, bool collidingInPreviousFrame, bool isTrigger)
97  : pairId(pairId), nbPotentialContactManifolds(0), potentialContactManifoldsIndices{0}, body1Entity(body1Entity), body2Entity(body2Entity),
98  collider1Entity(collider1Entity), collider2Entity(collider2Entity),
99  isAlreadyInIsland(false), contactPairIndex(contactPairIndex), contactManifoldsIndex(0), nbContactManifolds(0),
100  contactPointsIndex(0), nbToTalContactPoints(0), collidingInPreviousFrame(collidingInPreviousFrame), isTrigger(isTrigger) {
101 
102  }
103 
104  // Remove a potential manifold at a given index in the array
105  void removePotentialManifoldAtIndex(uint32 index) {
106  assert(index < nbPotentialContactManifolds);
107 
108  potentialContactManifoldsIndices[index] = potentialContactManifoldsIndices[nbPotentialContactManifolds - 1];
109  nbPotentialContactManifolds--;
110  }
111 };
112 
113 }
114 
115 #endif
